text: Lumen is a platform technology company
and inside of our business we have many
many customers that sit on Legacy voice
networks that are based on Old
Technologies and and copper-based
technologies that need to be moved to
the cloud alianta is a cloud
communications platform for service
providers that's helping them move
physical infrastructure off of Legacy
soft switching networks and into a cloud
operating environment Alianza and Lumen
have been working together
to migrate some of our customer base
from this old technology to this
cloud-based communication experience
onto that sits on top of AWS Allianz has
built our Cloud communications platform
on the AWS platform but we use Amazon
services like compute storage database
as well as Amazon chime SDK moving into
a cloud operating environment gives them
real-time Innovation capabilities and
gives them confidence that they're no
longer in what we call a cul-de-sac
technology scenario but they're actually
like liberated to move quickly and move
fast on a modern freeway we're helping
our customers go from these old things
that aren't sustainable to a more
scalable cloud-based software-based
environment that gives them more case
capabilities and and more features and
more scalability and better performance
